import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.ensemble import GradientBoostingClassifier
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Create features
# Add family size
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

# Add age groups
train_df['AgeGroup'] = pd.cut(train_df['Age'], bins=[0, 12, 18, 35, 60, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3, 4])
test_df['AgeGroup'] = pd.cut(test_df['Age'], bins=[0, 12, 18, 35, 60, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3, 4])

# Add fare bins
train_df['FareBin'] = pd.cut(train_df['Fare'], bins=[0, 10, 20, 40, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3])
test_df['FareBin'] = pd.cut(test_df['Fare'], bins=[0, 10, 20, 40, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3])

# Encode categorical variables
le_sex = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Sex'] = le_sex.fit_transform(train_df['Sex'])
test_df['Sex'] = le_sex.transform(test_df['Sex'])

le_embarked = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Embarked'] = le_embarked.fit_transform(train_df['Embarked'])
test_df['Embarked'] = le_embarked.transform(test_df['Embarked'])

# Prepare features and target
X_train = train_df[['Pclass', 'Sex', 'Age', 'FamilySize', 'AgeGroup', 'FareBin', 'Embarked']]
y_train = train_df['Survived']

# Fill missing values
X_train['Age'].fillna(X_train['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
X_train['Fare'].fillna(X_train['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)

# Drop any remaining NaNs
X_train = X_train.dropna()

# Train model
model = GradientBoostingClassifier(n_estimators=200, learning_rate=0.1, max_depth=3, random_state=42)
model.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Predict on test data
X_test = test_df[['Pclass', 'Sex', 'Age', 'FamilySize', 'AgeGroup', 'FareBin', 'Embarked']]
X_test['Age'].fillna(X_test['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
X_test['Fare'].fillna(X_test['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
X_test = X_test.dropn

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.ensemble import GradientBoostingClassifier
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Create features
# Add family size
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

test_df['AgeGroup'] = pd.cut(test_df['Age'], bins=[0, 12, 18, 35, 60, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3, 4])

test_df['FareBin'] = pd.cut(test_df['Fare'], bins=[0, 10, 20, 40, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3])

le_sex = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Sex'] = le_sex.fit_transform(train_df['Sex'])
test_df['Sex'] = le_sex.transform(test_df['Sex'])

train_df['Embarked'] = le_embarked.fit_transform(train_df['Embarked'])
test_df['Embarked'] = le_embarked.transform(test_df['Embarked'])

y_train = train_df['Survived']

# Fill missing values in X_train
X_train = X_train.copy()
X_test = test_df[['Pclass', 'Sex', 'Age', 'FamilySize', 'AgeGroup', 'FareBin', 'Embarked']].copy()

X_train['Age'].fillna(X_train['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
X_train['Fare'].fillna(X_train['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)

# Drop any remaining NaNs

model.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Predict on test data
X_test['Age'].fillna(X_test['Age'].median(), inplace=True)

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.ensemble import GradientBoostingClassifier
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Create features
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

test_df['AgeGroup'] = pd.cut(test_df['Age'], bins=[0, 12, 18, 35, 60, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3, 4])

test_df['FareBin'] = pd.cut(test_df['Fare'], bins=[0, 10, 20, 40, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3])

# Encode categorical variables
le_sex = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Sex'] = le_sex.fit_transform(train_df['Sex'])
test_df['Sex'] = le_sex.transform(test_df['Sex'])

le_embarked = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Embarked'] = le_embarked.fit_transform(train_df['Embarked'])
test_df['Embarked'] = le_embarked.transform(test_df['Embarked'])

y_train = train_df['Survived']

# Fill missing values

X_test = test_df[['Pclass', 'Sex', 'Age', 'FamilySize', 'AgeGroup', 'FareBin', 'Embarked']].copy()

# Fill missing values for Age and Fare
X_train['Age'].fillna(X_train['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
X_train['Fare'].fillna(X_train['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
X_test['Age'].fillna(X_test['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
X_test['Fare'].fillna(X_test['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)

# Drop any remaining NaNs
X_train = X_train.dropna()
X_test = X_test.dropna()

# Train model

model.fit(X_train, y_train)

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.ensemble import GradientBoostingClassifier
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Create features
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

# Add age groups
train_df['AgeGroup'] = pd.cut(train_df['Age'], bins=[0, 12, 18, 35, 60, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3, 4])
test_df['AgeGroup'] = pd.cut(test_df['Age'], bins=[0, 12, 18, 35, 60, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3, 4])

# Add fare bins
train_df['FareBin'] = pd.cut(train_df['Fare'], bins=[0, 10, 20, 40, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3])
test_df['FareBin'] = pd.cut(test_df['Fare'], bins=[0, 10, 20, 40, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3])

# Encode categorical variables
le_sex = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Sex'] = le_sex.fit_transform(train_df['Sex'])
test_df['Sex'] = le_sex.transform(test_df['Sex'])

le_embarked = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Embarked'] = le_embarked.fit_transform(train_df['Embarked'])
test_df['Embarked'] = le_embarked.transform(test_df['Embarked'])

# Prepare features and target
X_train = train_df[['Pclass', 'Sex', 'Age', 'FamilySize', 'AgeGroup', 'FareBin', 'Embarked']]
y_train = train_df['Survived']

# Create copies to avoid SettingWithCopyWarning
X_train = X_train.copy()
X_test = test_df[['Pclass', 'Sex', 'Age', 'FamilySize', 'AgeGroup', 'FareBin', 'Embarked']].copy()

# Fill missing values
X_train['Age'].fillna(X_train['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
X_train['Fare'].fillna(X_train['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
X_test['Age'].fillna(X_test['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
X_test['Fare'].fillna(X_test['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)

# Drop any remaining NaNs
X_train = X_train.dropna()
X_test = X_test.dropna()

# Train model
model = GradientBoostingClassifier(n_estimators=200, learning_rate=0.1, max_depth=3, random_state=42)
model.fit(X_train, y_train)

import numpy as np
from sklearn.ensemble import GradientBoostingClassifier

# Load data

test_df['AgeGroup'] = pd.cut(test_df['Age'], bins=[0, 12, 18, 35, 60, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3, 4])

test_df['FareBin'] = pd.cut(test_df['Fare'], bins=[0, 10, 20, 40, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3])

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Create features
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

# Add age groups
train_df['AgeGroup'] = pd.cut(train_df['Age'], bins=[0, 12, 18, 35, 60, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3, 4])
test_df['AgeGroup'] = pd.cut(test_df['Age'], bins=[0, 12, 18, 35, 60, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3, 4])

# Add fare bins
train_df['FareBin'] = pd.cut(train_df['Fare'], bins=[0, 10, 20, 40, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3])
test_df['FareBin'] = pd.cut(test_df['Fare'], bins=[0, 10, 20, 40, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3])

# Encode categorical variables
le_sex = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Sex'] = le_sex.fit_transform(train_df['Sex'])
test_df['Sex'] = le_sex.transform(test_df['Sex'])

le_embarked = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Embarked'] = le_embarked.fit_transform(train_df['Embarked'])
test_df['Embarked'] = le_embarked.transform(test_df['Embarked'])

# Prepare features and target
X_train = train_df[['Pclass', 'Sex', 'Age', 'FamilySize', 'AgeGroup', 'FareBin', 'Embarked']]
y_train = train_df['Survived']

# Create copies to avoid SettingWithCopyWarning
X_train = X_train.copy()
X_test = test_df[['Pclass', 'Sex', 'Age', 'FamilySize', 'AgeGroup', 'FareBin', 'Embarked']].copy()

# Fill missing values in the features
X_train['Age'] = X_train['Age'].fillna(X_train['Age'].median())
X_train['Fare'] = X_train['Fare'].fillna(X_train['Fare'].median())
X_test['Age'] = X_test['Age'].fillna(X_test['Age'].median())
X_test['Fare'] = X_test['Fare'].fillna(X_test['Fare'].median())

# Drop any remaining NaNs
X_train = X_train.dropna()
X_test = X_test.dropna()

# Train model
model = RandomForestClassifier(n_estimators=200, random_state=42)
model.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Predict
y
